issue.title: VectorLoader corrupts vectors with duplicate names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1190](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1190). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
loading vectors from a batch that contains some fields with duplicate names results in corruption where only one of the duplicate-named vectors gets actually loaded.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1190?focusedCommentId=16077386) by Antony Mayi (antonymayi):*
suggesting [PR #816](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/816) as a solution

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1190?focusedCommentId=16090016) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 816
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/816>
